title: ALEC Begins Tobacco Industry Partnership for Legislative Influence
summary: ALEC's executive director actively sought funding from the Tobacco Institute trade group, beginning a lucrative partnership that would provide legislative influence for the tobacco industry. This early corporate capture model would become the template for ALEC's expansion into multiple industries seeking state-level legislative influence.

sources.title: Some ALEC Funders Flee, but Koch, Big Tobacco, and PhRMA Remain Loyalists
